topic.title: 中華文討論圈
topic.body: 講漢語的都在這裡討論吧，讓我看看還有沒有沒睡覺的呢？

10_1MEWJRMLgvofqG9Mbsb2Rc4hFFyv7HeRx7.body: this is a web without internet deepweb is bullshit. if u belive it u r stupid

> [kingbudgie](#comment_7_17nphNHoGtz9EzvvTSSbZn7WHfM1ynpdsL): deep web is a stupid bullshit term that an internet faggot known as sabu made up while drunk one day to scare children like you.
> Technically this is a dark web because data here is not accessible without special software. (be it the zeronet software or the proxies)

i agree with u bro
i just can't belive it that anyone trust deepweb today? it is ridiculors
